Package io.atlasmap.service

Class AtlasLibraryLoader

java.lang.Object
java.lang.ClassLoader
io.atlasmap.spi.CompoundClassLoader
io.atlasmap.spi.ReloadableClassLoader
io.atlasmap.service.AtlasLibraryLoader
public class AtlasLibraryLoader extends ReloadableClassLoader
The class loader to achieve dynamic loading for which is required for design time backend, such as custom field action, Java Document and custom mapping. The user uploaded jar is dynamically added and classpath is updated to reflect them in UI on the fly.

    • getSubTypesOf

      public ArrayList<String> getSubTypesOf(Class<?> clazz, boolean allowAbstract) throws AtlasException
      Gets the library class names available through this loader, with filtered to the sub type of the class specified.
      Parameters:
      clazz - class to filter
      allowAbstract - true to allow abstract classes
      Returns:
      filtered library class names
      Throws:
      AtlasException - unexpected error

    • addListener

      public void addListener(AtlasLibraryLoader.AtlasLibraryLoaderListener listener)
